service.name: createShippingAgreement
service.description: Create Agreement with SHIPPING_AGREEMENT type, Create Agreement Roles For Representives

service.name: createPartyQuickly
service.description: Create a party quickly, If party is not exist

service.name: reserveProductInventoryForTransfer
service.description: Reserve Inventory for a Product. If requireInventory is Y the quantity not reserved is returned, if N then a negative availableToPromise will be used to track quantity required(by the Transfer) beyond what is in stock.

service.name: reserveTransferItemInventory
service.description: Create OrderItemShipGrpInvRes or increment existing reserved quantity.

service.name: issueTransferItemShipGrpInvResToShipment
service.description: Add an TransferItemShipGrpInvRes to a Shipment

service.name: changeTransferItemStatus
service.description: Change the status of an existing order item. If no orderItemSeqId is specified, the status of all order items will be changed.

service.name: checkTransferItemStatus
service.description: Check the status of all items and cancel/approve/complete the transfer if we can

service.name: changeTransferStatus
service.description: Change the status of an existing transfer

service.name: checkDeliveryTransferStatus
service.description: Check the status of all delivery of transfer
